text:
Our collaboration with
AWS Professional Services was
pivotal in our cost optimization goal.

Previously, we had a
legacy compute platform
that ran on auto scaling groups,
but they just weren't as
efficient as we wanted them to be.

So we knew we had to implement
this strategic move across

the company involving
thousands of projects
within a very quick timeframe.

By using AWS Professional
Services, we were able

to horizontally scale the
work that we were doing

and make sure that we had
the impact we wanted in
as quick a time as possible.
One of the major accomplishments
out of our engagement
with AWS Professional Services
was the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes
service migration.
In the end we saw about 50%
reduction in our scaling speeds
for infrastructure, which is
very important for our company.
The result of that is we were able
to get about a 62% cost savings
by leveraging AWS's infrastructure
and technical expertise.

Every dollar that we had
saved through this engagement,
we actually reinvested in our company,
in our growth projects
and new products that are being released.
We launched new services
and features globally in the best,
most efficient and performative manner.

Coinbase benefits from the
24/7 support provided by AWS.
As we launch new services
or onboard new features into our company,
we rely on these experts within support
to efficiently use the resources
and quickly get an expert on
the line to let us know exactly

what is happening, and help
us take that to a resolution.
AWS provides us a backbone to ensure
that we can operate efficiently
and at scale with our infrastructures.
